cast.overview: Suffering from insomnia, disturbed loner Travis Bickle takes a job as a New York City cabbie, haunting the streets nightly, growing increasingly detached from reality as he dreams of cleaning up the filthy city.
cast.title: Taxi Driver

details.biography: Garth Avery was born on 18 October 1952 in Manhattan, New York City, New York, USA. She was an actress, known for Taxi Driver (1976). She died on 19 October 1994 in New York City, New York, USA.
details.name: Garth Avery
details.place_of_birth: Manhattan, New York City, New York, USA
